co.cask.cdap.api.mapreduce

Interface MapReduceSpecification

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProgramSpecification, PropertyProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMapReduceSpecification, ForwardingMapReduceSpecification

    public interface MapReduceSpecification
extends ProgramSpecification, PropertyProvider
    This class provides the specification for a MapReduce job.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataSets

        Set<String> getDataSets()
        Returns:
        An immutable set of DataSets that are used by the MapReduce.

      • getOutputDataSet

        @Nullable
String getOutputDataSet()
        Returns:
        name of the dataset to be used as output of mapreduce job or null if no dataset is used as output destination

      • getInputDataSet

        @Nullable
String getInputDataSet()
        Returns:
        name The name of the dataset to be used as input to a MapReduce job or null if no dataset is used as the input source.

      • getMapperResources

        @Nullable
Resources getMapperResources()
        Returns:
        Resources requirement for mapper task or null if not specified.

      • getReducerResources

        @Nullable
Resources getReducerResources()
        Returns:
        Resources requirement for reducer task or null if not specified.
